unit_rules.name: Voice of the Triarch
unit_rules.text:
At the start of each Battle-Round, select one of the following effects that apply to friendly +Necrons+ units within 6" of this unit's Szarekh model:
* Ranged attacks may reroll Hit rolls of 1 and Wound rolls of 1.
* Charge rolls may be re-rolled.
* Ignore any or all modifiers to the unit's traits (excluding modifiers to saving rolls).

unit_rules.name: The Silent King
unit_rules.text: At the end of each Battle-Round, select a friendly Battle-Shocked +Necrons+ unit within 12" of this unit's Szarekh model. That unit is no longer Battle-Shocked.

unit_rules.name: Triarchal Menhirs
unit_rules.text: If this unit's Szarekh model is destroyed, any remaining Triarchal Menhir models are also destroyed.
